channel.title: How do I make npcs stay in place and speak
channel.description: How do I make npcs stay in place and speak? Like I want 2 wise old men to stand right on each of the sides of the entrance of the varrock bank and say "Zypherx23x is owner" and "Reddemon756 is co owner" . Please help me on this 1 .

item.title: How do I make npcs stay in place and speak
item.dc:creator: @baller1 baller1
item.description:
@baller1 wrote:

where i paste it?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make npcs stay in place and speak

item.title: How do I make npcs stay in place and speak
item.dc:creator: @whosdr whosdr
item.description:
@whosdr wrote:

for talking, go into npchandler and scroll to the middle. coppy one and past it below. where the text is (im sure you can find it) on what you pasted change to one of the texts then in npctype put the npc id. coppy this new one past above and put the second text on. compile and run. that makes them talk.

im not sure if its the same for each server but i can make you one…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make npcs stay in place and speak

item.title: How do I make npcs stay in place and speak
item.dc:creator: @Zypherx23x Zypherx23x
item.description:
@Zypherx23x wrote:

What do i put under the RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption if i want a wise old man to stand there facing north?
I have the coords already but what do i put under RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption for that?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make npcs stay in place and speak

item.title: How do I make npcs stay in place and speak
item.dc:creator: @Jackierox68 Jackierox68
item.description:
@Jackierox68 wrote:

Umm go to autospawn (right-click if it has a pic of the four coloured squares and open with notepad) Im not real sure about every NPC or how to make them talk but Ok, the NPC id should go first heres an example for a greater demon in Varrock Square.

spawn = 83 3089 3524 0 3262 3424 3262 3424 2651 Greater Demon

Try to Copy & Paste that

Read full topic

item.description:
@The-Legend wrote:

im not sure how to get them to speak but to get them to stay there go to your Autospawn.cfg and type in the NPC ID the XCORD, YCORD
